LanguageData.AllConnectedPawnsAreAway: All connected pawns are too far away.
LanguageData.DesiredConnectionStrengthDescNew:
All connected pawns will prune {TREE_definite} often enough to keep connection strength above this level.

Higher connection strength allows supporting more dryads, but also falls faster and thus takes more frequent pruning to maintain.

You can click on the bar to adjust the desired target connection strength.

Connection strength fall per day: {FALL}

Connection strength is affected by nearby buildings.
LanguageData.PawnIsAlreadyConnectedToThatTree: {0} is already connected to Gauranlen Tree.
LanguageData.WaitingForConnectorsToChangeCaste: Waiting for any connected pawn to change dryad caste.
LanguageData.MaxBonusDryadLabel: Maximum bonus dryads for multiple pawns per tree
LanguageData.DaysForDryadsToGrow: Days for dryads to grow. Applies only after current dryad spawned.
LanguageData.DisableTreeExtractingExpanded: Enable tree extracting for Gauranlen Tree
LanguageData.MaxMossRadiusExpandedLabel: Maximum radius for Gauranlen Moss spawn
LanguageData.DefendTreeExpandedDesc: Call all dryads to protect the Gauranlen Tree for several hours. Dryads will wander near tree attacking any nearby enemies.
LanguageData.RitualCannotConnectMorePawnsGauranlenTre: Tree already has maximum connected pawns.
LanguageData.PruningTicksExpanded: Amount of time for one prunning cycle
LanguageData.DebuffDurationDaysGauranlenTreeExpanded: Disconnection duration (Requires game restart to apply)
LanguageData.DebuffBaseMoodValueGauranlenTreeExpanded: Base mood debuff (Requires game restart to apply)
